channel.title: Laptop on Eddie Abbondanzio
channel.description: Recent content in Laptop on Eddie Abbondanzio

item.title: WorkStation - Goodbye Windows
item.description: I’ve been using Windows for as long as I can remember. Back when Windows 2000 was a big deal I remember using it to play Space Cadet pinball although I was never very good at it.

item.title: WorkStation - More RAM
item.description: # Mo' RAM, Mo' Problems I use my laptop for a ton of software development. I’ve been working on launching a SaaS and I often need to have a development build of the backend running along with the frontend.
